ai-tha-ap310:2.1_0: if that sacrifice or in charge of building work
ai-tha-ap310:2.2_0: arched harp, applies to the wind,
ai-tha-ap310:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap310:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap310:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vaggumudā.
ai-tha-ap310:6.1_0: The eighth part of the senior monk who was practiced by the senior monks.
